EmailTemplate.name: 201711_Americas_Email2_LTS101_LL (As350 & BK117).201711_Americas_Email2_LTS101Up
EmailTemplate.subject: Comprehensive LTS101 Support Plan Offered by Airwork
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.airwork.co.nz/]]>
Maintenance Made Easy with Airwork
Airwork's LTS101 hourly support plan takes the hassle out of maintaining your BK117 or AS350 aircraft. As a Honeywell Authorized Service Center, Airwork provides a wide range of support plans that are tailored to suit operator needs.
Choose from a range of fixed hourly rate Airwork Support Plans (ASP) – whether you just need the engine supported or a more comprehensive support service. See what Airwork has to offer:
- No surprise budgeting - Stay in the air with an extensive pool of rental modules - Keep costs under control - State of the art facilities, and deal directly with qualified engineering and maintenance experts
So, stay in the air and choose a Airwork Support Plan for your future and ongoing maintenance requirements.
LEARN MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/AirworkNZ_LTS101.html]]>
